title: Software Engineer | Problem Solver | Innovator
summary: Experienced Software Engineer skilled in developing scalable solutions using Java, Springboot, and MongoDB. Proficient in utilizing AWS services including Lambda, SQS, Kinesis, CloudWatch, API Gateway, ECS, and Parameter Store. Adept at the entire software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering to deployment and maintenance. Passionate about solving complex challenges and staying ahead in the ever-changing tech landscape. Seeking opportunities to contribute to innovative teams and deliver impactful solutions. Let's connect and discuss how I can bring value to your organization
Created and Implemented new APIs for business requirement, I was responsible for coding and testing the same.
Collaborated with the team for brainstorming solutions to problems.
Launched service in spring boot, Responsible for coding, and testing of the same.
Technologies Used: Java, Spring Boot, AWS, MongoDB, Git, Jenkins, React, Node
Involved in Cards Payment-based DevOps Project on Network Processing.
Automated the test case with Java, for the reliability of the system.
Technologies Used: Java, Golang, Docker, Kubernetes, Bitbucket, and in-house Automated Tools.
Trained in Java Core, MY-SQL, Hibernate, JPA
Internship in MERN Technology at Infosys.
M -> MongoDB, E -> ExpressJS, R -> ReactJS, N -> NodeJS

project.name: Weather App | React-App | Node js
desc: It is an app which shows the weather information

project.name: Visitor Management System | Using Servlet
desc: Visitor management systems allow organizations to streamline the check-in process for visitors.
This project is made in servlet using MVC Framework HTML, CSS, JS are used for front-end management and MYSQL is used as a back-end.

project.name: Online Shopping Website | Using Servlet
desc: Online Shopping System helps in buying goods, products, and services online by choosing the listed products from the website.
This project is made in servlet using MVC Framework. HTML, CSS, JS are used for front-end management and MYSQL is used as a back end. Payment gateway is made using Paytm API.
